metadata.title: CVE-2021-23982 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Using techniques that built on the slipstream research, a malicious webpagecould have scanned both an internal network's hosts as well as servicesrunning on the user's local machine utilizing WebRTC connections. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 78.9, Firefox < 87, and Thunderbird <78.9.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
